code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./CourseMap.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function CourseMap(){const[currentHole,setCurrentHole]=useState(0);const holes=[{number:1,image:'/holes/aerial-hole-1.png',description:'A challenging par 4 with a dogleg right. A strong drive sets up a good chance for a closing birdie.'}];const handlePrevious=()=>{setCurrentHole(current=>current===0?holes.length-1:current-1);};const handleNext=()=>{setCurrentHole(current=>current===holes.length-1?0:current+1);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"course-map",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Course Map"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"subtitle",children:"Swipe between each hole to see what it looks like and the details."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hole-viewer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Hole #",holes[currentHole].number]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"carousel-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"nav-button prev",onClick:handlePrevious,"aria-label":"Previous hole",children:"\u2039"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"hole-image",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:holes[currentHole].image,alt:`Hole ${holes[currentHole].number}`})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"nav-button next",onClick:handleNext,"aria-label":"Next hole",children:"\u203A"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"hole-description",children:holes[currentHole].description})]})]});}export default CourseMap;
